pkgmetadata.longdescription: Connect to Your 'Zendesk' Data // Facilitates making a connection to the 'Zendesk' API and executing various queries. You can use it to get ticket data and ticket metrics. The 'Zendesk' documentation is available at https://developer.zendesk.com/res t_api/docs/support/introduction. This package is not supported by 'Zendesk' (owner of the software).
